overview: Hu Ge, a young doctor from Wanfeng Town, is picking medicine in the mountains when he comes across six young girls in distress. That night, the six girls reveal their original forms, which are made of fox demons, and Hu Ge, who abides by the principle that "human beings and demons are different and should not be treated together", is determined to drive away the fox demons
title: The Legend of the Seductive Fox Spirits
